ENTRY.refkeywords: multi multiple ancillary auxilliary auxiliary read arf instrument response responses load readarf readfile

DESC.PARA: The load_multi_arfs command loads multiples ARFs (effective areas) from FITS files and assigns them response ids. More than one ARF may be associated with a single dataset.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
filename - a list of the files (with path) which contain the ARF data
resp_id - a list containing a response id for each file loaded

DESC.PARA: The ARF files source1.arf and source2.arf are loaded as responses 1 and 2 for the default dataset.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
